title: I've Never Thought About it That Way
description:
Rosalinda is a divorced mom who's dating a man with four kids, and Dr. Laura helps her realize the huge mistake she's making by letting a guy take time and energy away from Rosalinda's own child. - Dr. Laura: "Children of divorce need their parents' attention, not their dating drama."

Did you have a parent who dated while you were living at home? How did that make you feel? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura
